resources.string: \'Contains OS data © Crown copyright and database rights 2016\' and Geomni UK Map data © and database rights [2019]

Enter the name of the bus stop to add or the stop code. The stop code is a 5 digit code that can be found at the bus stop. If both name and code are given, the system will choose based on the stop code alone. If you enter the name alone, the system will add all the stops with that stop name.
Input delete image that deletes the displayed stop from the list
